attribute_data.name: Superstrength
attribute_data.description: Allows lifting and carrying massive weights beyond normal strength. Adds +5 damage to unarmed attacks and +1 Damage Multiplier to melee/thrown weapons per level. Works independently of the Body Stat.

defect_data.name: Inept Attack
defect_data.description: Character is poor at offensive combat. They suffer reduced accuracy, either generally or in certain types of attacks (melee, ranged, etc.).

defect_data.name: Inept Defence
defect_data.description: Character is ineffective at defending. They suffer a reduced ability to dodge or block, either generally or in specific types of combat.
